text_block_list.text: Just a little longer until the main event of the event――

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Did you hear? It looks like a lot of girls declined just because Bryan-senpai was in the 10th group…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: I heard, I heard! That group was the only ones in the GI class. I'm so glad I declined…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …Hmm, so that's what happened.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh? What?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …Don't tell me you're telling me to decline.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: It doesn't matter what the others do! I'm leaving.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: You're right. Brian's a dangerous opponent. She's not even good enough to be called a GI-Class.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Even in the event race, the teachers and trainers were watching closely, so I could understand what they were saying.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: But I'm not going to withdraw.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Heh, that's right. You get it.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …I'm going to be a cool girl. Then I can't be scared here!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Come on, let's go, Trainer! The real battle's coming up soon, so we need to train hard!
Several days passed as I watched Vodka devote herself to her training.
The main event of the event has finally come.
(Waaaaaaah!!)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Please listen to this cheer! The star of the 10th race, 2000 meters of grass, is just as excited as the GI race!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: It's a fearsome 'monster', Naritabrian!!
(Waaaaaah!!)

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …What a racket.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Brian… She's really pushing herself.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Oh, are you ready to withdraw? I'll go talk to the committee.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: D-Don't do that! Don't do anything unnecessary!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: ……I'll win.Watch!!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Alright, alright, I'll keep an eye on you. …Geez.

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text: She was loudly declaring that she'd win, but…… Wohka, are you trying to beat Naritabrian?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Vodka has potential too……but that's a bit……
Finally, the vodka race began.
(*crunch*)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah, hah…!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (I'll do it, too……! If I beat Senpai here……I won't be cool!)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: All right…!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Vodka stepped forward here! She dodged the group with supple acceleration!!
It was a fast pace from the beginning, since it was a race with all the power, but vodka was doing her best to keep up.
But when the race comes to an end…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Haah, haah… haah…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (Crap… My vision is getting cloudy!)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Dammit…!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …I'll decide!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: She's here, Naritablyan! She's here, she's here, she's here, she's here, she's here, she's here, she's here, she's here!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Damn iiiiiiit!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Vodka's going to pick up speed, too! But is the gap going to be tough?! She's headed by Naritabrian, and she's only five to six!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (No good…… She's too strong……!!)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I can't……I can't keep up……

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Naritabrian, goooooooh!! You showed me a magnificent run worthy of being overwhelming!!
…Unfortunately, Vodka ended up in fifth place.

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text: That was a pretty reckless challenge.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Yes. If she had chosen the right stage, she would have been the star.
choice_data_list: Hey, if you insult her already――
If you insult her a little…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hey now, what's with that scary look on your face, trainer?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: It's fine. Actually… it can't be helped.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I'm……seriously useless right now……
『That's not true』……I was about to tell her that, but Vodka left.
